attributes.action: withdraw the United Kingdom from the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After this weekends appauling result, it is as obvious as the nose on your face that no matter who sings what, very few will ever vote our way. This competition is now solely ruled by political byas........

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
